description: Explore how Python is transforming medical robotics in this engaging talk. Discover applications in medical imaging and predictive maintenance, focusing on extracting critical insights to enhance robotic performance. Attendees will learn to leverage Python's data science tools to tackle complex healthcare challenges. A basic understanding of Python and its libraries will enrich the experience, enabling participants to engage with the content and apply insights to their projects. Ideal for Python developers, data scientists, and healthcare tech enthusiasts—no medical background is required, just a passion for Python and its innovative potential in cutting-edge medical technology.
title: Ctrl+Alt+Heal: Python and the Future of MedTech
